page.title: 15MONK BRETTON VILLAGE
page.content: I'm Kate Harris and I have been chosen to write about my village,{Monk {Bretton.}The{village}is growing all the time with{buildings}going up on every available patch of land. We do have{park}which has a{few swings but it suffers from{vandalism.}The {library}does offer some recreation along with the{cricket club}for the boys but there is very{little}in the way of{amenities. There are quite a few{shops, butcher, {baker}but no{candlestick maker!}We are soon to have a{chemist's shop}in the village - about time too. People who had a prescription from the village doctor had to go 3 miles in to town. I like Monk Bretton; it's a{cosy place with{old people}talking to{young ones and{Pc Pearson}on his beat helping anyone he can and making sure the hooligans behave.
